content: make a single basket or create a set of 3 modern baskets and hang them to help organize your space stitched in bernat blanket o go this lovely crochet hanging basket is the perfect size as a catchall or as a handy plant basket worked in the round in sturdy split single_crochet and featuring chain stitches this multi-color basket looks like knit and is worked straight from the o go wheel to create modern stripes with a fold-over edge and relaxed profile this basket is sure to find a place in your home yarn s for model s bernat® blanket™ o go™ 10 5 oz/300 g 220 yds/201 m fired clay 42008 or purple plum 42012 or agave 42010 1 o go two video tutorials are available for this pattern crochet crowd with mikey https //www youtube com/watch v=v4ba7ckdv2i marly bird https //www youtube com/watch v=hefkmn1zjec
